title: Hi officer just waiting for a m8
body: His name's Stat Screen. I can't actually do anything else 'til he comes. Idk where he is... I've been here since last week.

replies.body: Hi who are you and what are you saying O.o?

I saw this and was gonna post "If only Officer Caitlyn" would reply.
But you already had :'(
Pls im only here 'cause my m8 hasn't turned up yet don't arrest me
maybe one day you'll be nearly as cool as myself. Not any time soon though I'm afraid q.q.
